thread.section_title: PickleballCentral Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PickleballCentral | pickleballcentral.com
thread.title: Steven

author: Steven
title: Steven
text: After playing for PB for a while and try different paddles I decided on one and it was delivered as ordered. No big deal. It was after playing with it I realized I wanted a heavier paddle. I called and spoke with Twi (?) who helped me find what I wanted to the point of walking back into the warehouse while on the phone and confirming she had it. There policy is they will exchange w/o problem and I expected to send what I had back and they would ship the new one. Nope - "we'll send it out today and just the other back as soon as you can". They did - I did (paddles must have past in the mail.) That is a big deal! It just doesn't get any better. Thanks
